According to reports, Johnstone, who was called up to replace the injured Arsenal keeper Aaron Ramsdale, was unable to train with the squad on Tuesday and is now set to pull out of the squad.

articles.title: Granit Xhaka's yellow card against Aston Villa angered Arsenal fans but do the stats suggest he is harshly treated? - Sky Sports

articles.content:

articles.title: O2 Inside Line | The Next Level | Defeat in Paris - England Rugby
articles.description: England travelled to Paris to take on France in the final round of the Guinness Six Nations with the hosts looking to secure a Grand Slam.

articles.title: After Phil Mickelson's Masters retreat the Saudis remain ready to plug $35m hole in his wallet - The Telegraph
